name: Roaring Rex
details: Roaring Rex is a ferocious dinosaur toy with realistic sound effects. It features textured skin, movable limbs, and glowing red eyes. Battery-powered.

name: Fluttering Flamingo
details: Fluttering Flamingo is a beautiful bird toy that flaps its wings when activated. It has vibrant pink feathers, a long neck, and a stable base. Battery-operated.

name: Cuddly Koala
details: Cuddly Koala is an adorable plush toy that is incredibly soft and huggable. It has a velvety coat, a cute button nose, and a small pouch on its belly. No batteries required.
